name: Zen Blocks - Puzzle Board Game
description: Zen Blocks is an addictive original block puzzle game using original game play mechanics. Click the activators around any of the 4 sides of the play grid to release a color block. Mixing some elements of match 3 and tetris style gameplay in a chinese setting. Original Game Design. A Bargain Game for Christmas!!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card. Storage: 40 MB available space
